thread.title: Justin Bieber Added as Performer for 2015 MTV Europe Music Awards
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber Added as Performer for 2015 MTV Europe Music Awards

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Justin Bieber Added as Performer for 2015 MTV Europe Music Awards
text:
Comments The 'What Do You Mean?' singer is announced to take the stage at the Mediolanum Forum in Milan for the EMAs. 
Justin Bieber is the latest addition to the upcoming MTV Europe Music Awards. "I'm excited to share this performance and this new material with my fans around the world. The EMAs are always a blast. I'm glad to be back and it's going to be fun," he says. The EMAs will air on Sunday, October 25 in the U.S. from the Mediolanum Forum in Milan. Sheeran will co-host with " Orange Is the New Black " star Ruby Rose . Charli XCX , Tinie Tempah , and Hailey Baldwin are among the presenters.
